name: Italian Fabric Pants Navy Blue / Luxury Chinos / Size 30 32 34
description: http://burnmyclothesatsea.com.au Navy blue Italian fabric, epicly comfortable, flexible and luxurious. These things feel like a god has kissed your legs. The fabric is strong, soft and 100% cotton. Fairly low rise with a slim fit but not tight. Slightly tapered. Welt coin pocket and fat jet back pockets. Double stitched flat fell inseam and double or reinforced stitches wherever possible. Studded four button fly. Heavy cotton twill lining. Thick belt loops. Slightly long so you can roll or tailor. Pre-washed so no shrinkage. Made in Melbourne. Model 185cm, 81kg, wears a 32. Measured flat. 30 waist 41cm rise 24cm inseam 87cm knee 19cm leg bottom 16cm 32 waist 44cm rise 25cm inseam 87cm knee 20cm leg bottom 17cm 34 waist 46cm rise 26cm inseam 90cm knee 22cm leg bottom 18cm

name: Green Tee / Handmade Lightweight / Basic Design / S-M-L
description: http://burnmyclothesatsea.com.au Simple green tee, very lightweight, 80gsm cotton fabric. Neck slightly dipped at the front with a thick rib. Contrast stitching. Shoulder seams are reinforced to help retain the shape. Twisted side seams. Pre washed for minimal shrinkage. Made in Melbourne. Measured Flat. Sizing is on the large side so check measurements to be sure.
